sentences.en: They live on the outskirts of Milan.
As they approached the outskirts of the city, Ella's mood visibly lightened.
sentences.cn: 随着他们越来越接近市郊，埃拉的心情明显变得轻松了。

sentences.en: He did not take the direct route to his home, but made a detour around the outskirts of the city.
sentences.cn: 他没有直接回家，而是在市郊绕了一段路。
